Articles.Content:
This M700 Survey Scanner... how it work!?

I send rocket to 100 km polar Kerbin orbit. as scanner say must be between 60 km to 160 km. So I put her at 100 km with mechjeb. Mechjeb always make it very stable. And I tried active scan. and it keep say I'm not in some range or stable. I tried again and again. Nothing happen ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

HELP!!!!

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-28T22:10:23Z" title="04/28/2015 10:10  PM" data-short="9 yr">April 28, 2015</time> by Deaf3279**
Screenshot please? Also the error message is very specific.
... I guess I'll deploy sat again. i delete this sat out of orbit

I dunno why, First it was not work. Now it work fine. Here screenshot of my Satellite and orbiting Kerbin

![screenshot10_zpscyccdez3.png](http://i1310.photobucket.com/albums/s652/Deaf3279/screenshot10_zpscyccdez3.png)

![screenshot11_zpsvb84eucz.png](http://i1310.photobucket.com/albums/s652/Deaf3279/screenshot11_zpsvb84eucz.png)
